summary: Project Schedule module new features testing completed successfully. All 3 enhancements (Edit functionality, Customer Information section, Sub-items for phases) are working correctly. Backend PDF generation includes customer info and sub-items sections. 18/18 backend tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: Edit functionality correctly uses editingScheduleId state and handleEdit function
Customer info auto-populates from selected project's client and location
Sub-items have all 5 required fields: Description, Qty, Unit, Location, Remarks
PDF backend includes Customer Information section (indigo header) and Phase Breakdown & Details section (cyan header)
Schedule data stored in localStorage (by design)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Project Schedule module has 3 new features: 1) Edit functionality with 'Edit Project Schedule' title and 'Update Schedule' button, 2) Customer Information section with 6 fields (name, company, location, contact_person, phone, email), 3) Sub-items for each phase with expand/collapse toggle and '+ Add Item' button. PDF generation includes both customer info and sub-items sections.

Backend_PDF_Generation.customer_info: PASS - New test for customer_info section
Backend_PDF_Generation.sub_items: PASS - New test for phase sub-items
Backend_PDF_Generation.customer_info_and_sub_items: PASS - New test for combined features
Backend_PDF_Generation.empty_sub_items: PASS - New test for empty subItems arrays

Frontend_UI.customer_info_section: PASS - Customer Information section visible with indigo background

Frontend_UI.add_item_button: PASS - '+ Add Item' button visible when phase expanded
Frontend_UI.edit_button_on_card: PASS - Edit button (pencil icon) on schedule card
Frontend_UI.update_schedule_button: PASS - Shows 'Update Schedule' instead of 'Save Schedule'
Frontend_UI.pre_filled_data: PASS - Edit modal shows pre-filled customer info and phases
Frontend_UI.view_modal: PASS - Shows customer info, project details, Gantt chart
Frontend_UI.view_modal_edit_button: PASS - Edit button in View modal
Frontend_UI.view_modal_download_pdf: PASS - Download PDF button in View modal
Frontend_UI.customer_info_on_card: PASS - Customer name displayed on schedule card

Integration.save_to_localStorage: PASS - Schedule saves to localStorage correctly
Integration.pdf_generation_with_customer_info: PASS - PDF includes customer info section
Integration.pdf_generation_with_sub_items: PASS - PDF includes Phase Breakdown & Details section

features_verified: Edit button on schedule card opens modal with pre-filled data
Edit modal shows 'Edit Project Schedule' title and 'Update Schedule' button
Customer Information section is visible in create/edit modal
Customer info fields: Customer Name, Company, Location, Contact Person, Phone, Email
Phases have expand/collapse toggle for sub-items
'+ Add Item' button adds sub-items to a phase
Sub-items have fields: Description, Qty, Unit, Location, Remarks
Saving edited schedule updates localStorage correctly
Customer info displays on schedule card
PDF generation includes customer information section
PDF generation includes Phase Breakdown & Details section with sub-items
